nodes.text: Raste was a male Human communications officer who served aboard the Esseles during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, Raste was present in the Esseles when the starship was under attack by Emperor's Glory under the command of Moff Kilran. After Captain Tyrus was killed in the Glory's first attack, Raste received an incoming message from the enemy, forcing all members of the ship to stand down.
